name: mpim.open
desc: This method opens a multiparty direct message.

users.desc: Comma separated lists of users.  The ordering of the users is preserved whenever a MPIM group is returned.

errors.not_enough_users: Needs at least 2 users to open.
errors.too_many_users: Needs at most 8 users to open.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
